item.title: Redefining Trust in the Era of Agentic AI
item.description: See how the rise of agentic AI is changing the game for security teams. Get tips on trust, adoption, and staying ahead in the evolving SOC landscape.

item.title: Introducing Splunk Victoria Experience on Google Cloud: Faster, Clearer, More Resilient
item.description: Splunk VE is now available on Google Cloud, giving organizations and admins a more transparent, responsive, and flexible Splunk Cloud Platform experience.

item.title: Beyond Deepfakes: Why Digital Provenance is Critical Now
item.description: Combat AI misinformation with digital provenance. Learn how this essential concept tracks digital asset lifecycles, ensuring content authenticity.

item.title: Behind the Walls: Techniques and Tactics in Castle RAT Client Malware
item.description: Uncover CastleRAT malware's techniques (TTPs) and learn how to build Splunk detections using MITRE ATT&CK. Protect your network from this advanced RAT.

item.title: From Discovery to Defense: Detecting Local LLMs to Address Shadow AI
item.description: Uncover and defend against Shadow AI risks from local LLMs. Learn how Splunk detects unauthorized AI frameworks, prevents data leakage, and strengthens enterprise security.

item.title: Security Staff Picks To Read This Month, Handpicked by Splunk Experts
item.description: Our Splunk security experts share their favorite reads of the month so you can follow the most interesting, news-worthy, and innovative stories coming from the wide world of cybersecurity.

item.title: Splunk Security Content for Threat Detection & Response: November Recap
item.description: Discover Splunk's November security content updates, featuring enhanced Castle RAT threat detection, UAC bypass analytics, and deeper insights for validating detections on research.splunk.com.

item.title: How to Manage Planned Downtime the Right Way, with Synthetics
item.description: Planned downtime management ensures clean synthetic tests and meaningful signals during environment changes. Manage downtime the right way, with synthetics.

item.title: Unlocking New Possibilities: Splunk and AWS Better Together
item.description: Discover how Splunk and AWS are revolutionizing security and AI/ML for EMEA organizations. Learn about federated search for S3, SageMaker integration, and real-world analytics innovations from the recent Splunk Partner Team event in Amsterdam.

item.title: What is Observability? An Introduction
item.description: In this blog post, we'll look at definitions, best practices, and key concepts around Observability in IT.

item.title: What are SaaS, PaaS, & IaaS?
item.description: Yes, the cloud makes work better. But which cloud model is right for you? Understand how SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS works in this ultimate guide.

item.title: Telemetry 101: An Introduction To Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry is powerful data that can tell you all sorts of important information. Know what you can do with this useful data — get the full telemetry 101 here.

item.title: What Are SLMs? Small Language Models, Explained
item.description: Large language models have changed the world. What about small language models? Learn what SLMs are, how they differ from LLMs, and why SLMs are the future.

item.title: IT and Technology Spending & Budgets for 2025: Trends & Forecasts
item.description: Tech & IT spending is on the rise in 2025 across the globe. Read more on investment trends and see which regions will spend the most.

item.title: SIEM: Security Information & Event Management Explained
item.description: SIEM is a cybersecurity game-changer, especially for large organizations. Learn key SIEM features and functions & how to choose the right SIEM tool.

item.description: At .conf25, we unveiled new capabilities in Splunk Observability Cloud that redefine digital resilience in the AI era with smarter detection and investigation of business-critical issues.

item.description: Splunk's Kamal Hathi recaps our innovation highlights from .conf25, marking a pivotal moment for Splunk and Cisco as we deliver significant new value to our customers that make the use of AI a practical reality in their organizations.

item.title: MachineGPT: Speaking the Language of Machines to Shape the Future of AI
item.description: MachineGPT brings the power of generative AI to one of the most overlooked resources: machine data. Splunk SVP & GM Kamal Hathi explains why mastering data as the heartbeat of the digital world is a game changer.
